archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.3.1a: a) defining common and consistent terminology for conducting and managing risk assessments (e.g. the terms used to describe impact, loss, threat, threat event, vulnerability, likelihood, frequency and risk appetite)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
